m80.name: M-80
m80.description: Small hand held firework.  Throw quickly

firecracker.name: Firecracker
firecracker.description: Generic hand held firework.  Watch your fingers

bees.name: Killer Bees
bees.description: Stationary; shoots a fountain of fireworks upwards. Very loud

roman_candle.name: Roman Candle
roman_candle.description: A cardboard tube that launches colorful fire.

butterfly.name: Butterfly
butterfly.description: Ejects two cones in opposite direction, create a symmetrical butterfly effect.

dragon_egg.name: Dragon Egg
dragon_egg.description: Launches into the air, leaves a streaming crackling, strobing effect.

blasting_cap.name: Blasting Cap
blasting_cap.description: Small contact explosive. Typically used to detonate other explosives.

tannerite.name: Tannerite
tannerite.description: Brand name binary explosive, typically used for exploding target practice targets.

c4.name: C-4
c4.description: A plastic explosive, with clay-like texture.

carbonite.name: Carbonite
carbonite.description: Explosive typically used in coal mining.
